title: Ticket #4542: Maintain [Last]EvictReason in job ad.
description:
We should use the job ad to tell the user why the job was evicted. For instance, a common reason in the VM universe would be because of a failure to launch. Other common reasons might include the job being preempted, the machine failing, or the running past its allotted time.

We currently record many of these reasons in the user log, but doing so in the job ad has two benefits: it makes it easier to run without the log; and it if we choose the attributes carefully, should permit better policy-making.

The latter suggests we should follow the HoldReason[[Sub]Code] pattern.
